original_text: While Solomon ruled as king, there was as much silver in Jerusalem as stones! There was as much wood from cedar trees as there were fig trees that grew in the low hills in the west.
korean_text: 왕이 예루살렘에서 은을 돌 같이 흔하게 하고 백향목을 평지의 뽕나무 같이 많게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: there was as much silver in Jerusalem as stones
There was as much wood from cedar trees
as there were fig trees that grew in the low hills in the west
